row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.HPQC_ARRAYS_TO_DEFECT_XML
row.description: Utility to convert arrays to an xml

row.Docu: = Include name = PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.HPQC_ARRAYS_TO_DEFECT_XML = General description = Takes two arrays as inputs and produces defect field xml = Inputs = UC4RB_HPQC_FIELD_NAMES : array of field names of a defect UC4RB_HPQC_FIELD_VALUES : array of values of field names of a defect = Behaviour = (see general description) = Outputs = It will publish UC4RB_HPQC_DEFECT_XML variable which contains the defect field xml = Rollback = (none) = Logging = AE logs will be created/displayed in the AE report. Java logs will be created at \temp\hpqc.log under agent installation directory. = Example = (none)

row.process:
!--------------------------- Getting Template for Defect fields------------------------------------------ :SET &DEFECT_FIELDS_TEMPALTE#="<Field Name=""HPQC_DEFECT_FIELD_NAME""><Value>HPQC_DEFECT_FIELD_VALUE</Value></Field>"
:DEFINE &IDX#, unsigned :SET &IDX# =1
:DEFINE &UC4RB_HPQC_DEFECT_XML#, string :SET &UC4RB_HPQC_DEFECT_XML#=""
:SET &NAME_LEN# = LENGTH(&UC4RB_HPQC_FIELD_NAMES#[]) :SET &VALUE_LEN# = LENGTH(&UC4RB_HPQC_FIELD_VALUES#[])
:IF &NAME_LEN# > 0
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_DEFECT_XML#= STR_CAT(&UC4RB_HPQC_DEFECT_XML#,"<Fields>")
:WHILE &IDX# LE &NAME_LEN# : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_DEFECT_XML#= STR_CAT(&UC4RB_HPQC_DEFECT_XML#, &DEFECT_FIELDS_TEMPALTE#) : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_DEFECT_XML#= STR_SUBSTITUTE(&UC4RB_HPQC_DEFECT_XML#,"HPQC_DEFECT_FIELD_NAME",&UC4RB_HPQC_FIELD_NAMES#[&IDX#]) : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_DEFECT_XML#= STR_SUBSTITUTE(&UC4RB_HPQC_DEFECT_XML#,"HPQC_DEFECT_FIELD_VALUE",&UC4RB_HPQC_FIELD_VALUES#[&IDX#])
:SET &IDX# = &IDX# + 1 :ENDWHILE : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_DEFECT_XML#= STR_CAT("&UC4RB_HPQC_DEFECT_XML#","</Fields>") :ENDIF
:P '&UC4RB_HPQC_DEFECT_XML#'
:PUBLISH &UC4RB_HPQC_DEFECT_XML#,,"TOP"
